meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed streptothricins to fight the infection.
meanings.sent2: Streptothricins are commonly used to treat bacterial illnesses.
meanings.sent3: The streptothricins marched into the body like tiny soldiers ready for battle.
meanings.sent4: Her body welcomed the streptothricins like a shield against the invading bacteria.
meanings.sent5: The streptothricins worked tirelessly to combat the harmful germs.

meanings.definition: A group of antibiotics used to treat bacterial infections.
meanings.sent1: The streptothricins were effective in clearing up the infection.
meanings.sent2: Doctors often rely on streptothricins to combat bacterial diseases.
meanings.sent3: The streptothricins partied in the body, celebrating their victory over the bacteria.
meanings.sent4: In the war against bacteria, streptothricins were the fearless warriors.
meanings.sent5: The patient felt relief as the streptothricins fought off the harmful invaders.
